name: To the Men, Women and Children of the Classic Motor City Treasury
description: There are residents of Detroit, Michigan that are struggling in silence. Many of them live among us and we pass them every day. This treasury will be built for the following: Food pantries, Legal aid, transportation, Job creation, and safety for neighborhoods. As time progresses we will either add, remove or change what the assets will be used for. Education in finance will also be a part of this progression moving forward. Website and social links will be added shortly.
payDisclosure: This button is for donations only. You don't have to be a resident to donate. Thank you! Your donation will be going towards what was stated in the description of our project.
